on reading compounds: 揮毫【キゴウ】writing (esp. commissioned calligraphy), drawing, painting
総指揮【ソウシキ】supreme command, direction over all
陣頭指揮【ジントウシキ】taking command of a corps in a battle, command exercised by the leader of a group
kun reading compounds: 振るう【ふるう】to swing, to wield (physically), to exert, to exercise (e.g. power, ability), to exhibit, to display, to wield (metaphorically), to flourish, to prosper, to thrive
